titleStmt.title: Belgisch parlementair corpus ParlaMint-BE-en, plenaire zitting van 27-04-2017 [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Belgian parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-BE-en, plenary session of 27-04-2017 [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]

respStmt.resp: Data retrieval and conversion to TEI
Machine translation to English and linguistic analysis of the translation

availability.p: Deze bestanden zijn beschikbaar volgens de Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License
This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: Plenumvergadering van Donderdag 27 april 2017 Namiddag
Séance plénière du Jeudi 27 avril 2017 Après-midi

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

ParlaMint is een project dat tot doel heeft (1) een meertalige reeks vergelijkbare corpora van parlementaire handelingen te creëren die uniform zijn gecodeerd volgens de Parla-CLARIN aanbevelingen en die zowel de COVID-19 pandemie vanaf november 2019 als de eerdere periode vanaf 2015 bestrijkt om als referentiecorpus te dienen; (2) de corpora taalkundig te verrijken met syntactische structuren volgens de Universal Dependenciesrichtlijnen, en annotatie van named entities toe te voegen; (3) de corpora beschikbaar te maken via concordancers en Parlameter; en (4) use cases in politieke wetenschappen en digitale geesteswetenschappen te bouwen op basis van de corpusgegevens.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

revisionDesc.change: Tomaž Erjavec: Generate TEI version of MTed corpus.
Henk van der Pol: initial version.

div.note: The meeting was opened at 2.18 p.m. and chaired by Siegfried Bracke.
The meeting was called to order at 2.18 p.m. and chaired by Mr. Siegfried Bracke.
A series of communications and decisions must be notified to the Chamber. They shall be included on the website of the Chamber and in the Annex to the integral report of this meeting.
A series of communications and decisions must be brought to the attention of the House. They will be included on the House's website and included in the annex to the full record of this sitting.
At the opening of the meeting, the Ministers of the Federal Government:
Ministers of the Federal Government present at the opening of the sitting:
Vanessa Matz, Fatma Pehlivan, Sébastian Pirlot, for health reasons/
Dirk Van der Maelen, Karolien Grosemans, with shipment abroad /
Alexander De Croo, Didier Reyners, with shipment abroad /
- Mr Wouter De Vriendt to the Prime Minister on "the election of Saudi Arabia as a member of the UN Commission on the Status of Women" (No. P1992)
